title: It was good quality
text: This particular hat it's made with good materials And comes in a very nice box but I wish the sticking in the front of the hat was better it's like u can hardly see it with a new era hat the make the emblem a lot more prominent,  I'm nit picking but when u pay 50 for a hat make the hat look good u can keep the box

title: Sold me used
text: Sold me a used hat. Tags had been removed. Cardboard insert had been removed.
